name: BambooHR Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 BambooHR Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume BambooHR API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume BambooHR API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: employee

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Get (值: get) - Get a company report

synced.name: synced
synced.description: Whether the employee to create was added to a pay schedule synced with Trax Payroll
synced.natural_language_description: 参数名: Synced with Trax Payroll | 作用: Whether the employee to create was added to a pay schedule synced with Trax Payroll | 默认值: False | (必填项)

firstName.name: firstName
firstName.natural_language_description: 参数名: First Name | (必填项)

lastName.name: lastName
lastName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Last Name | (必填项)

address.name: address
address.natural_language_description: 参数名: Address | 默认值: {} | (必填项)

dateOfBirth.name: dateOfBirth
dateOfBirth.natural_language_description: 参数名: Date of Birth | (必填项)

department.name: department
department.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
department.natural_language_description: 参数名: Department Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

division.name: division
division.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
division.natural_language_description: 参数名: Division Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

employeeNumber.name: employeeNumber
employeeNumber.natural_language_description: 参数名: Employee Number | (必填项)

exempt.name: exempt
exempt.natural_language_description: 参数名: FLSA Overtime Status | (必填项)

hireDate.name: hireDate
hireDate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Hire Date | (必填项)

location.name: location
location.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
location.natural_language_description: 参数名: Location Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

maritalStatus.name: maritalStatus
maritalStatus.natural_language_description: 参数名: Marital Status | (必填项)

mobilePhone.name: mobilePhone
mobilePhone.natural_language_description: 参数名: Mobile Phone | (必填项)

paidPer.name: paidPer
paidPer.natural_language_description: 参数名: Pay Per | (必填项)

payRate.name: payRate
payRate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Pay Rate | 默认值: {} | (必填项)

payType.name: payType
payType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Pay Type | (必填项)

preferredName.name: preferredName
preferredName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Preferred Name | (必填项)

ssn.name: ssn
ssn.description: A standard United States Social Security number, with dashes
ssn.natural_language_description: 参数名: Social Security Number | 作用: A standard United States Social Security number, with dashes | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: department (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
division (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
location (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
ssn (值: None) - A standard United States Social Security number, with dashes

employeeId.name: employeeId
employeeId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Employee ID | 作用: ID of the employee | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: fd (值: None) - Whether to apply the standard duplicate field filtering or not
onlyCurrent (值: None) - Whether to hide future dated values from the history table fields or not

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 5

addasasress.name: addasasress
addasasress.natural_language_description: 参数名: Address | 默认值: {} | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: categoryId (值: None) - Move the file to a different category. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
name (值: None) - New name of the file
shareWithEmployee (值: None) - Whether this file is shared or not

fileId.name: fileId
fileId.natural_language_description: 参数名: File ID | 作用: ID of the file | (必填项)

output.name: output
output.description: The name of the output field to put the binary file data in
output.natural_language_description: 参数名: Put Output In Field | 作用: The name of the output field to put the binary file data in | 默认值: data | (必填项)

simplifyOutput.name: simplifyOutput
simplifyOutput.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simplifyOutput.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

categoryId.name: categoryId
categoryId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
categoryId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Category Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.description: The name of the input field containing the binary file data to be uploaded. Supported file types: PNG, JPEG.
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Data Field Name | 作用: The name of the input field containing the binary file data to be uploaded. Supported file types: PNG, JPEG. | 默认值: data | (必填项)

reportId.name: reportId
reportId.description: ID of the report. You can get the report number by hovering over the report name on the reports page and grabbing the ID.
reportId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Report ID | 作用: ID of the report. You can get the report number by hovering over the report name on the reports page and grabbing the ID. | (必填项)

format.name: format
format.description: The output format for the report
format.natural_language_description: 参数名: Format | 作用: The output format for the report | 默认值: JSON | (必填项)
